overview: A twisted trash comedy centred around the exploits of two vicious transvestites; Danielle The Minx, a crass dancer who has a penchant for chiko rolls and Lollice, a leopard print attired hooker who has a pimp called Daddy Mollasses. Competing for power, control and domination they must survive the brutal and savage world of prostitution, crime and showbiz!
title: Vicious Minx
